==Trivia==
* This subarea's name isn't shown on map until completion of the quest ''[[For Fruits, Seeds, and Trees]]''.
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Aśvattha''|sa=अश्वत्थ}} is the Sanskrit name of the {{W|Ficus religiosa|sacred fig}} (''Ficus religiosa''), which holds significance in {{W|Ashvattha|Hinduism}}, Jainism and {{W|Bodhi Tree|Buddhism}}.
